document.docAuthor: Santos, Bianca Tamires Silva Dos, Bartz, Marie Luise Caroline, Hernández-García, Luis Manuel, Rousseau, Guillaume Xavier, Martins, Marlucia Bonifácio & James, Samuel Wooster
document.masterDocTitle: New earthworm species of Righiodrilus (Clitellata, Glossoscolecidae) from eastern Amazonia

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New earthworm species of Righiodrilus (Clitellata, Glossoscolecidae) from eastern Amazonia

heading.emphasis:
Key to species of
Righiodrilus
(updated and modified from Feijoo & Gil 2010 )

paragraph.keyLead:
- Male pores with tubercula pubertatis in anterior region of xvii or middle ½ 16 – ½ 17..........
R. venancioi ( Righi, 1982 )

6. Six pairs of spermathecae in ix–xi, 2 pairs per segment; clitellum in xvi–xxi; male pores in xvii/xviii................................................................................
R. sucunduris ( Righi, Ayres & Bittencourt, 1976 )

- Four pairs of spermathecae, in xiv–xvii; clitellum in xvi–xxiii; male pores in xviii/xix..................
R. gurupi
n. sp.

12. Tubercula pubertatis in 1/2 xix–1/2 xx. Male pores in 19/20...................................
R. uete ( Righi, 1988 )

- Tubercula pubertatis in xvii–xix. Male pores in 17/18.......................................
R. cigges ( Righi, 1970 )

14. Clitellum in xvii–xxiii; tubercula pubertatis in xix–xxiii....................................
R. freitasi ( Righi, 1971 )

- Clitellum in xvi–xiv; tubercula pubertatis in 1/2 xix–xxii....................................
R. aioca ( Righi, 1975 )

15. Male pores in 1/2 xix; clitellum in xvi–xxii; tubercula pubertatis in 1/2 xix–1/2 xxi.................
R. tico ( Righi, 1982 )

- Male pores in xvii; clitellum in 1/2 xv–1/2 xxiii; tubercula pubertatis in xvii – xx...........
R. andake Feijoo & Gil, 2010

20. Tubercula pubertatis in xviii–xix.....................................................
R. paolettii ( Righi, 1984 )

- Tubercula pubertatis in 1/2 xvi–1/2 xix..........................................
R. lebrijae Celis & Rangel, 2015

- Clitellum in xvi–xxiii; tubercula pubertatis absent................................................
R. moju
n. sp
22. Male pores in xvi/xvii; tubercula pubertatis in 1/2 xvi–1/2 xviii............................................... 23

- Male pores in 17/18; tubercula pubertatis in 1/2 xvii–xx...................................
R. ortonae ( Righi, 1988 )

- Spermathecae in line with setae d...............................................
R. fontebonensis ( Righi, 1988 )
25. Clitellum in xv–xxii; tubercula pubertatis in 1/2 xvii–1/2 xx.................................................. 27
- Clitellum and tubercula pubertatis in another position...................................................... 28
26. Clitellum in xv–xxi; tubercula pubertatis in 1/2 xvi–1/2 xix.................................................. 29

- Clitellum in xiv–1/2 xxii; tubercula pubertatis in 1/2 xvii–1/2 xx...........................
R. inga Feijoo & Gil, 2010

27. Papillae pubertatis absent in xxi; tubercula as grooves with dark color in xviii, xix–xx...
R. tocantinensis pola ( Righi, 1984 )

- Papillae pubertatis present in genital field 1/2 xvii–1/2 xx; papilla midventral in xxi..................................................................................................
R. tocantinensis tocantinensis ( Righi, 1972 )

28. Clitellum in 1/2 xiii–xxii; tubercula pubertatis in xvii–xx.................................
R. marcusae ( Righi, 1969 )

- Clitellum in xv–xxiv; tubercula pubertatis in xvii–xxiii.............................
R. schubarti (
Righi et al ., 1978
)
